short_description:
Create and edit musical playlists for your Playstation Portable™ / Créez et éditez des playlists musicales pour votre Playstation Portable™

With Easy PSP Playlists Maker, you have just to launch the software then plug your PSP to PC, and enjoy creating your favorites music playlists on your device!
Easy PSP Playlists Maker Generate .m3u8 files needed by the PSP software to generate playlists of your songs. Very useful!
summary: Create and edit musical playlists for your Playstation Portable™
